From the brand

A keep giving gift for women

A gift for your family and your love.

How did we get our start?

BAIMEI is about empowering yourself to feel beautiful. Our story begins with a single piece of jade, presented as a gift to our family.

What makes our products unique?

Our products are perfect for everyday use and an essential to anyone who wants to improve their beauty routine with small, natural tools.

Why do we love what we do?

We‚Äôre confident our products will have a positive impact in the lives of people either by buying them for themselves or receiving it as a special gift from a loved one as a token of care.

Face roller and gua sha set

Gift from natural

Jade roller and gua sha made of jade or other natural stones are for face and body massage.

Ice Roller + Gua Sha

BAIMEI is about empowering yourself to feel beautiful. We know what it‚Äôs like to feel fed up with your routine, not seeing results and not feeling any better off. We‚Äôre here to help you find the right tools that can bring comfort and peace into your life.

Product Dimensions ‚Äè : ‚Äé 7.09 x 5.51 x 1.42 inches; 7.05 Ounces
Item model number ‚Äè : ‚Äé JK-0052
Manufacturer ‚Äè : ‚Äé BAIMEI
ASIN ‚Äè : ‚Äé B08RD6S5HF

The skincare face massager tool is smooth, sturdy and no squeaky. It provides the cool feeling and energizes the skin
Gua Sha: not only can lift your skin and improve fine lines with upwards pressure, but it also helps to shape your jawline
Tips: You can keep the facial jade roller and Guasha in the fridge for about 10 minutes to keep it cooler and this helps to reduce morning puffiness and get the skin refreshed
The face roller and gua sha are packaged in a beautiful gift box. We suggest you wash the skin care tools for face after and before each use

Previous page
Next page

1 Trust 2 Us

What will you get from jade roller and gua sha?

Reduce Puffiness

The jade roller works by providing a cooling sensation on skin, firming skin and reducing puffiness. It’s soothing on face.

Relieve Dark Circles

It helps maximize the absorption of the moisturizers and help reduce the appearance of fine lines and dark ciercles.

Lift Your Face

You can use Gua Sha to shape your jawline and cheekbones and easily work it into your routine especially if you already use a face oil.

Brighten Complexion

Regular and correct use of jade roller and Guasha can help to stimulate circulation and tighten pores. Help you to relax and calm the muscle tension.

Tip: There’s a detailed instrction came with the jade roller and gua sha set, it’s easy to be followed.

Gentle For Your Furry Friend – These refreshing dog wipes are extra gentle and ideal for daily use around your pet’s eyes, ears, face, body and butt. Won’t remove spot flea treatments. Perfect for your puppy, kitten and even pet pig! Lightly scented, vanilla and coconut.
Use Less Wipes – The 7 x 11 inch wipes are larger than standard wipes, making them the smart choice for large pets and helps reduce how many wipes you need to use. Moistened with a gentle cleaning formula, and enriched with a soothing organic oat extract to keep your pet’s coat soft, shiny and smelling great.
Super Convenient, Goodbye Shampoo – Petkins are perfect for quick touch ups between baths. Use as dog paw wipes after a muddy walk, or when it’s too cold for a bath outside. A great solution for older pets that are difficult to bathe.
Easy To Use – Open the lid and remove seal. Pull a wet dog wipe out. Close lid tightly. Gently wipe entire pet until clean. No water or rinsing is required. Use daily or as needed.

Its original intention is to allow pet lovers to enjoy simple, convenient and cost-effective services in pet grooming. Behind the “oneisall” brand is ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $66.98 - ($58.99 / Count)
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:17:22 UTC – Details)

From the brand

oneisall

Founded in 2012

oneisall focus on creating products that give our pets and pet owners a better experience.

“oneisall” started with dog clippers. Its original intention is to allow pet lovers to enjoy simple, convenient and cost-effective services in pet grooming.

Behind the “oneisall” brand is the story of pet lover Peter. He found that taking dog for grooming would cost hundreds of dollars every month, and dog’s feeling was not good. Every time the clipper’s noise scared Joe. So Peter set out to design a low-noise and easy-to-use clipper.

Most popular products

Why do we love what we do?

At oneisall, our passion is pets,which drives us to produce the best possible products for our furry friends.We are borned from love for furbabys.

What makes our products unique?

We focus on making products that give our pets and pet owners a better experience. Leave the customer feedbacks in our top priority and put them into the design of products.

What’s our vision

oneisall hopes that we can bring peace of mind and quality to every pet owner, so that every pet can grow strong and healthy, and pet owners ca obtain longer and happier companionship.

Package Dimensions ‚Äè : ‚Äé 7.8 x 4.92 x 1.85 inches; 7.83 Ounces
Item model number ‚Äè : ‚Äé C61
Batteries ‚Äè : ‚Äé 1 Lithium Polymer batteries required. (included)
Manufacturer ‚Äè : ‚Äé oneisall
ASIN ‚Äè : ‚Äé B089W594LC

‚òÖ Quiet and Low Vibration Design: The dog clipper’s noise when working is about 60 db,ensure your pet is comfortable throughout the grooming process,without causing him any discomfort.
‚òÖBuilt-in Battery: Rechargeable by USB with indicator light, make it more convenient,without changing batteries. This nail trimmer can be used for about 2 hours after 2 hours of fully charging.
‚òÖSafe and Sharp Blade & Powerful Motor:Upgrade stainless steel fixed blade can provide excellent cutting performance. Works great for trimming small areas like paws,ears and eyes.
‚òÖWhat You Get: oneisall dog clipper set(with one small blade and one middle blade),one cleaning brush,one USB charging cord.

How to remove and install the blade?

1.Remove the blade counter clockwise rotation;

How to remove and install the blade?

2.Pull the blade out;

How to remove and install the blade?

3.Put the blade back to the clipper;

How to remove and install the blade?

4.Install the blade clockwise rotation.

Counter clockwise

Pull out

Put it back

Clockwise

4 Steps to Do Pet Hair Grooming

1. Bathing your dog,keep it clean with no dirt;

2. Grooming with a brush,remove the dirt and knots;

3.Shave dog hairs with oneisall dog clipper.

4.Use the dog trimmer to shave the small area hair.

Look your best at a moment’s notice! Whether you’re looking for an eyebrow razor, face shaver, or peach fuzz remover, our Schick Hydro Silk Touch-Up is a great all-in-one option that‚Äôs the perfect addition to your beauty routine. This multipurpose dermaplaning tool and face razor expertly shapes eyebrows, easily removes fine hairs by dermaplaning, and gently exfoliates and smooths your skin. Its blade is designed with fine micro-guards to help protect your skin, and it comes with an added precision cover for precise eyebrow shaping. It also makes a great travel razor, for fine-tuning on the go.

Create Beautiful Brows ‚Äì Includes a precision cover for precise eyebrow shaping.
High-Quality Blades ‚Äì Dermaplaning tool uniquely designed with fine micro-guards to help protect your skin from nicks and irritation.
Anytime, Anywhere ‚Äì Slim, portable-sized travel razor lets you take it wherever you go, so you’re always ready for a last-minute touch-up.
Convenience ‚Äì Hydro Silk Touch-Up tools can be recycled using our mail back program.

Look your best at a moment‚Äôs notice! Schick Hydro Silk Touch-Up razors quickly shape eyebrows and easily remove fine hairs. You can even gently exfoliate and smooth your skin. The high-quality blades feature fine microguards to help protect skin. The set includes 3 razors and 1 Precision Cover for precise eyebrow shaping.

Read more

Features and Benefits

Expertly Shapes Eyebrows

Easily style eyebrows and carefully touch-up stray hairs with the Precision Cover‚Äîan extra attachment included with purchase.

Smoothes and Exfoliates

Gently exfoliates, leaving skin feeling soft and smooth.

Comfortably Removes Fine Hairs

High-quality blade is uniquely designed with fine microguards to help protect your skin.

Free Yourself from Unwanted Hair

No need to worry that shaving might cause hair to grow back thicker‚Äîit‚Äôs simply untrue. With Schick Silk Touch-Up, you can comfortably remove unwanted hair from your face.

From the brand

V+bestlife

We are constantly discovering and meeting the needs of this changing world, we believe in V (victory), we can pursue the best life!

We think instant messaging will be more and more important in our lives and it is! Similarly, we believe that there will be more and more different changes in the demand for instant messaging. In order to allow more people who do not have instant messaging to join the information life, in this field, we are committed to discovering some distinctive and more Easy circulation of cell phones and telephone!

Information spreads faster in this world; we are committed to better understanding needs and producing products that better meet them!

How did we get our start?

We found that some needs were not being met, and then we wanted to address the situation.

What makes our products unique?

Whether it is in different countries, different regions, or different concepts and consumption habits, the development of the world makes consumer demand change extremely fast and huge. We are constantly discovering this change, catching up with this change, meeting this change, and making our products more in line with consumer needs. This is our starting point, and this is why we think our products are different.

At Vbestlife, our goal is to provide innovative, high-quality products that everyone can afford. Quality is the key! If for any reason, you don’t like Vbestlife’s smartphones, please tell us and we will help you solve it.

Excellent Smartphone

High Definition Camera

The smart phone is equipped with a high-definition camera, with bright colors, and each photo is as beautiful as a wallpaper. It is deeply developed and more complete and smooth. Front camera: 2MP, f/2.0 aperture, fixed focal length, rear camera: 2MP (color, f/1.8 aperture) autofocus.

Dual Card Dual Standby

This smart phone supports the simultaneous use of two SIM cards for data and phone calls, or the simultaneous use of memory cards for data storage. Scalable storage up to 128GB (128G memory card not included).

From the brand

Professional Blackhead Tools

How did we get our start?

JPNK is a founded in 2015. We are committed to providing safe and professional facial cleaning kits for women who love beauty all over the world.

What makes our products unique?

Our acne needle set is made of 304 stainless steel. We also opened a cosmetics tool product line, so that more customers can buy better products with less money.We always take product safety and product experience as the first standard, we design products based on customers’ needs.

Why do we love what we do?

We let more and more people enjoy beauty salon at home.

Product Description

Men’s Digital Sports Watch

LED Screen Large Face Waterproof Military Watch

LED digital military watch designed for men.Equipped with luminous, alarm clock, week, calendar and stopwatch function.Dial width: 47mmDial thickness: 14mm Total length of watch: 253mm

Detail Achievement Quality

Taiwan IC chipset, time goes precisely.

Japanese battery, providing extra long power.

High quality PC case for durability.

High transparency resin mirror, high hardness and good pressure resistance.

Cover

50M waterproof, suitable for daily use.

Stainless steel bottom cover, waterproof and cool.

Clasp

Stainless steel buckle, freely adjustable, convenient and durable.

Band

High quality PU band for flexible length adjustment.

Soft, durable and comfortable.

Features

Water Resistant to 50 Meters

164Ft / 50M waterproof, suitable for daily use. Can be worn when washing hands, raining, bathing or even swimming.Please DONOT press any buttons underwater.50M = 5ATM = Shower Proof – it’s ok to get it wet a bit.

Super Luminous Design

Use high-quality EL lighting technology, press the “LIGHT” button on the upper left, can see the time clearly in the dark.Fashionable sporty dial design, military style outlook.Large face and digital display, easy to read.

Multifunction

Luminous, week, alarm, stopwatch, calendar, waterproof, LED display, shockproofIdeal for all kinds of sports and daily use.Create the perfect visual effect and let you bloom with unique charm.
